about_the_game:
PRESENTATION

Odessa features inventive characters, great dialogues and one of Indinera's best, most intriguing storylines - with a lot of thrilling twists and turns that will keep you thinking and guessing!

A retired bodyguard has to team up with a smart down-to-earth bunny-girl, an elegant but tight-lipped beggar and a stray dog to keep the hope of rescuing his soon-to-be wife, spectacularly abducted by mysterious, spine-chilling individuals.

At the same time, a secretive cult around a strange goddess (the Goddess of Ashes) is developing.

How could the two things be related? And will he be able to see his beloved one again?

Play this exciting 2D RPG featuring both investigation and classic exploration, and find out.

FEATURES

  • 9 playable characters

  • 12 hours of playtime, 13 Relics, 8 Mystery Areas and 7 Animals to find

  • 45+ enemies

  • Mouse control

  • Visible Enemies

  • Autosave after each battle

  • Options to customize your experience including Adjustable Battle Speed

  • 3 Modes of Difficulty

  • Spells and skills you can master, to create even stronger "super" technics!

  • New Game +/++

  • An enthralling plot full of twists and turns that will keep you guessing constantly

  • Great dialogues featuring unique and well-developed characters

  • Fantastic cut scenes to display better the intense plot twists

  • Gorgeous weather effects for a more immersive atmosphere

  • Dreams! Nightmares! Like in Laxius Force and Soul!

  • Indinera's signature and vintage style for gameplay and story
